titleStmt.title: A pæan triumphall Composed for the Societie of the Goldsmiths of London: congratulating his Highnes magnificent entring the citie. To the Maiestie of the King. / By Michael Drayton.
titleStmt.author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Felix Kingston] for Iohn Flasket, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the black Beare,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is probably blank; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
